fun.name: **`mb.quote https://discordapp.com/000/000/000 <DATE>`**
fun.description:
Creates an image with the specified message.
`<DATE>`: adds message year after the username

utilities.name: **`mb.shorten https://link.com <SLUG>`**
utilities.description:
Shortens the given URL.
`<SLUG>`: the id of the shortened URL.

utilities.name: **`mb.whois https://link.com <dbg.true>`**
utilities.description:
Returns WHOIS info about the domain.
`<dbg.true>`: returns the json response from the API. Debugging purposes only!

utilities.name: **`mb.poll <everyone> <here> POLL`**
utilities.description:
Creates a poll and pings **here** or **everyone** if specified.
*You need the `MENTION_EVERYONE` permission to be able to ping **here** or **everyone**.*

utilities.name: **`mb.generate.qr <!dark HEX_COLOR> <!light HEX_COLOR> DATA`**
utilities.description:
Creates a QR code with the given data.
`<!dark HEX_COLOR>`: sets dark color to the given hex color (if valid)
`<!light HEX_COLOR>`: sets light color to the given hex color (if valid)

utilities.name: **`mb.decode.qr`**
utilities.description: Decodes the QR code image in the attachments.

server.name: **`mb.settings`**
server.description:
Returns link to the bot dashboard. **(beta)**
*You need the server owner to configure the dashboard*

server.name: **`mb.settings.get`**
server.description: Returns bot settings for this server.

server.name: **`mb.review NUM_FROM_1_TO_5 REVIEW`**
server.description: Creates a review of the server. (if enabled)

moderation.name: **`mb.ban @user <DAYS> <REASON>`**
moderation.description:
Bans a member.
`<DAYS>`: Must be a value from 1 to 7. Default is 7.
*You need the `BAN_MEMBERS` permission.*

moderation.name: **`mb.kick @user <REASON>`**
moderation.description:
Kicks a member.
*You need the `KICK_MEMBERS` permission.*

moderation.name: **`mb.purge 1-99`**
moderation.description:
Purges messages in the channel.
*You need the `MANAGE_MESSAGES` permission.*

music.name: **`mb.m.play https://youtube.com/YT-V-ID`**
music.description: Plays the audio from the given YouTube video or adds the video to the queue.

music.name: **`mb.m.skip`**
music.description: Skips to the next video on the queue.

music.name: **`mb.m.stop`**
music.description: Disconnects the bot from the VC.
